text: Todo Noticias also know as TN (English: All News) is an Argentine television news channel. It belongs to Grupo Clarín since 1993, when it was launched. Débora Pérez Volpin was the known reporter for the channel from 2005 until her retirement in 2017. == News shows == === Monday to Fridays === Show Newscasters Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday TTN Natalia Marquiegui 5:00 a 6:00 TN de 6 a 10 Sergio Lapegüe and Roxy Vázquez 6:00 a 10:00 TN de 10 a 14 Guillermo Lobo and Lorena Maciel 10:00 a 14:00 Nuestra Tarde Dominique Metzger 14:00 a 17:00 Está Pasando Sandra Borghi and José Antonio Gil Vidal 17:00 a 19:00 TN Central Carolina Amoroso, Franco Mercuriali and Nicolás Wiñazki 19:00 a 21:00 Solo Una Vuelta Más Diego Sehinkman 21:00 a 22:00 TN de Noche Franco Mercuriali 24:00 a 1:00 23:30 a 1:00 24:00 a 1:00 21:00 a 22:00 === Weekends === ==== Saturdays ==== Show Newscasters Hour TN Fin de semana (Morning) Paula García and Santiago Do Rego 7:00 a 13:00 TN Fin de semana (Afternoon) Gustavo Tubio and Valeria Sampedro 16:30 a 21:00 TN Ya Gustavo Tubio 23:00 a 23:30 ==== Sundays ==== Noticiero Newscasters Hour TN Fin de semana (Morning) Paula García and Santiago Do Rego 7:00 a 13:00 TN Fin de semana (Afternoon) Diego Poggi and Marina Abiuso 15:30 a 17:00 Buena Semana Nacho Otero, Jimena Grandinetti and Mariana Segulín 17:00 a 20:00 Solo Una Vuelta Más (Special) Diego Sehinkman 20:00 a 22:00 TN Ya Guido Martínez 23:00 a 23:55 == Other Shows == *TN Deportivo *Desde el llano *A dos Voces (with Marcelo Bonelli and Edgardo Alfano) *La rosca (with Daniel Canedo y Eduardo Van der Kooy.) *La viola *En el camino (with Mario Markic) *TN Tecno *Cámara del Crimen *TN Autos *TN Internacional *Esta es mi Villa *Verdad / Consecuencia ==Slogans== *"Periodismo Independiente" (1993-2012) *"Todos Nosotros" (2008-) ==References == Category:Television channels in Argentina category:1993 establishments
title: Todo Noticias
